com.github.wuic.exception

Class WuicException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.github.wuic.exception.WuicException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StaticWorkflowNotFoundException, WorkflowNotFoundException, WorkflowTemplateNotFoundException

    public class WuicException
extends Exception

    This exception is a global checked exception thrown by WUIC. This class also provides utility methods that throw an appropriate exception for each requirement.

    Since:
    0.3.4
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • throwSaveUnsupportedMethodException

        public static void throwSaveUnsupportedMethodException(Class<?> clazz)

        Parameters:
        clazz - the class
